name: CUBEX
description:
(THIS IS IN BETA FOR THE SUPERGEEKS GAMEJAM)

2300 - A new computer is created, to generate files with consciousness.

2301 - A hacker invades the computer, creating a virus with consciousness.

The hacker names the virus CUBEX and teaches him how to do evil.

But while in standup, CUBEX hears that evil is something bad.

He turns himself into an anti-virus and he must be transfered to another computer to escape the hacker.

Are you strong enough to challenge the hacker?
